Solution Stack

Solution stack are a set of software solutions that are needed to deliver a fully functional solution. For a web application the stack requires an operating system, a web server, a database, and programming language. For the development of the web application, you require an IDE. This section provides an introduction to the various solutions we will use, how to use them and how to install them on your computer.

FTP
